post_content:
Here’s my monthly plea for cards! Let me know if you can help. I can use other 150s as well, for holes in the list, and upgrades. Priority is finding these ones:

M. Brown (Cubs on Shirt)
Burch (Batting)
Evers (Bat, Cubs on Shirt)
Pattee
Pelty
Reulbach (Glove Shows)
Abbaticchio (Brown Sleeves)
Ball
Bergen (Batting)

Cheerers,
Geno

Not sure how condition sensitive you are, but do have a Beaumont…..

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2nBKs77][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/52256739666_083660be05_c.jpg[/img][/url]

I picked up the above Beaumont last month, but added Bergen.  Who's got something for me?  Let me know!

Cheers,
Geno
I posted this one to its own thread, not sure if you saw it. Looking for $2k or best offer

Jay has a M. Brown sov 150 for sale on eBay.  Very tough card.  

I have the Evers cubs sov 150, but only interested in trades.  

Vr Zach


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
